entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -29.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 12:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -29.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
